actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for training in preventive medicine.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to medical schools for the planning, development, and operation of approved residency training programs in preventive medicine.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for training in preventive medicine.
